property.name: pointA
property.description: The first point. Can be an array, or an object with properties "x" and "y".

property.name: pointB
property.description: The point to transform. If no point is passed in then an x/y value of 0 will be used

page.description: Calculate the polar angle and distance from two points.

discussion.p: This method will calculate the angle and distance between two points. The points can be passed in as either an array where the first entry is the "x" value and the second entry is the "y", or and object with "x" and "y" properties.
